早上好，该开始工作了: Good morning my friend, let your smile change the world
中午好，该吃午饭了: Good noon, wish you get refilled after a pleasant meal
下午好，该干活了: Good afternoon, when friendship is your greatest weakness, you will be the strongest person in the world
晚上好，又加班了吧？: Good evening, like a night without starlight, so is a life without love
深夜了，向作为劳模的你致敬！: Good night, are you still there working, take care my friend
